title: BridgeDownstream
description: The fields added to the Parquet data by Bridge Downstream.

id.description: The foreign key of the parent dataset.

index.description: The position of this element in the original JSON array.

year.description: The year component of the Bridge field `UploadedOn`.

month.description: The month component of the Bridge field `UploadedOn`.

day.description: The day component of the Bridge field `UploadedOn`.
